transArray.content: This hotel is the third hotel I stayed in for a trip to Beijing, and it is also the hotel I am most satisfied with. The room is quite large and clean. The breakfast is not bad. The design of the front desk is also very modern, and the staff at the front desk are also very nice. Super enthusiastic, super nice attitude, I have already recommended it to the whole family, and I will definitely stay at the hotel next time I travel
